Html:
Hi,

GreatMaps is really great! it is an easy to use app to play with maps APIs.

I have a question regarding changing a route. If I use www.google.com/maps I can create a route between two and more points, let Google calculate a route (shortest, fastest etc.) and edit it afterwards. Can I do the same wiht GMap.Net?

 

Thanks in advance

 

Twand

Hi Radioman,

thank You for that information. I tried but I couldn't figure out how to do it ;(

A route seems to get no focus so therefore I cannot move it. I tried the DemoWinForms and DemoWPF.

 

Greetings

 

TWand
route is representation of streets, they can't be moved ;}
